channel.title: Moving NPCs from an old home, to a new one
channel.description:
I was wondering where you set the NPC coords for shops and such, and what they say/sell. Searching doesn't really work too well >.<"
Edit: This, also, came off the top of my head... On my new source (altered allstarscape v2), I give myself right = 3, and it says I'm only co-owner.. What's the deal?

@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:3, topic:296022”]autospawn = moving them to place to place
Npc handler = what they say[/quote]

I’m not really sure of what to change in autospawn…
What’s the basic setup?
